Summary: Increase Number of Products in Basket Feature Does not Properly
Creator: Kokosz
Description:
*Description:* The Increase Number of Products in Basket feature on the website is not working as expected, after reloading page.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Go to the cloth subpage and add any product.
# Navigate to basket.
# Click to increase number of products.
# Reload page.

*Expected Result*: The number of products in the basket should increase. The updated number should be reflected accurately on the basket subpage.

*Actual Result:* After reloading a page number of products is set to 1.

Summary: Increase Number of Products in Basket Test

# Add a product to the basket.
# Navigate to the basket subpage.
# Increase number of product previously added
# Refresh the page
# Verify the updated number of products in the basket.

*Expected Result:* The number of products in the basket should increase. The updated number should be reflected accurately on the basket subpage.

Summary: Remove from Basket Feature not Functioning Properly
Creator: Kokosz
Description:
*Description:* The Remove from Basket feature on the website is not working as expected. When the user clicks on the trash icon to remove a product, nothing happens. The product only disappears from the basket after the page is reloaded.

*Steps to Reproduce:*

# Go to the cloth subpage and add any product.
# Navigate to basket.
# Click on the trash icon to remove a product.

*Expected Result*: Upon clicking the trash icon, the selected product should be immediately removed from the basket without requiring a page reload.

*Actual Result:* After clicking the trash icon, the product does not get removed instantly. The product only disappears from the basket after the page is reloaded.
